name: 賀一平
objective: 本門課之目的是讓學生熟悉研究方法設計。主題涵蓋研究計劃之準備及撰擬 ;主要研究方法，如調查研究法、相關研究法、實驗研究法、個案研究法、人種誌研究法，行動研究法，觀察研究法和內容分析研究法；質性和量化資料之搜集與分析；敘述統計和推論統計。
schedule:
1.　　Orientation; Qualitative Research
2.　　Qualitative Research
3.　　Quantitative Research
4.　　Designing Research Projects and Writing Research Papers/Proposals
5.　　Ethnography
6.　　Case Study Research
7.　　Action Research
8.　　Grounded Theory
9.　　Classroom Observation
10.　　Oral Presentations
11.　　Analyzing Classroom Interaction: Interaction Analysis
12.　　Introspection Research
13.　　Interview
14.　　Interview
15.　　Survey 
16.　　Survey: Correlational Research
17.　　Quasi-Experimental Research; Experimental Research
18.　　Final Exam: Submitting Proposals and Making Oral Presentations
scorePolicy:
Attendance and Participation: 30%
Oral Presentation: 30%
Proposal or Research Report: 40%
materials:
Brown, J. D., & Rodgers, T. S. (2009). Doing second language  research. Oxford: Oxford University Press.
Nunan, D., & Bailey, K. M. (2009). Exploring second language classroom research.Boston, MA: Heinle/Cengage Learning.
Dornyei, Z. (2007). Research methods in applied linguistics.  Oxford: Oxford University.
